# UX Specification - Decentralized Autonomous Forum
**Generated By**: UX Agent
**Date**: 2025-10-21 18:00:00
**Project**: project-20251021-092500-decentralized-forum
**Version**: 1.0
**Status**: Ready for Design Agent

---

## Executive Summary

This comprehensive UX specification defines wireframes, design system, and accessibility guidelines for the Decentralized Autonomous Forum MVP. Based on:
- **User Research**: 5 personas, 5 journey maps, 12 pain points identified
- **Standards**: WCAG 2.1 Level AA, Material Design 3, Web3 UX best practices
- **Requirements**: 22 MVP features from Plan Agent

**Wireframes**: 10 critical user flows (detailed ASCII wireframes)
**Design System**: Colors, typography, components, spacing
**Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance framework
**Total Screens**: 45+ unique screens designed

---

## Table of Contents

1. [Design System](#1-design-system)
2. [Wireframes - Critical User Flows](#2-wireframes---critical-user-flows)
3. [Accessibility Guidelines](#3-accessibility-guidelines)
4. [Component Library](#4-component-library)

---

## 1. Design System

### 1.1 Color Palette

**Primary Colors** (BNB Chain Brand):
```
Primary (BNB Yellow):    #F3BA2F (Buttons, CTAs, highlights)
Primary Dark:            #D9A004 (Hover states)
Primary Light:           #FFF8DC (Backgrounds, highlights)

Secondary (Trust Blue):  #2B6CB0 (Links, secondary actions)
Secondary Dark:          #1E4E8C (Hover states)
Secondary Light:         #EBF8FF (Info backgrounds)
```

**Neutral Colors** (Interface):
```
Background (Light):      #FFFFFF (Main background)
Background Dark:         #1A202C (Dark mode background)
Surface:                 #F7FAFC (Cards, elevated surfaces)
Surface Dark:            #2D3748 (Dark mode cards)

Text Primary:            #1A202C (Body text)
Text Primary Dark:       #F7FAFC (Dark mode body text)
Text Secondary:          #718096 (Captions, metadata)
Text Tertiary:           #A0AEC0 (Placeholders, disabled)
```

**Semantic Colors**:
```
Success Green:           #48BB78 (Confirmations, success states)
Warning Orange:          #ED8936 (Warnings, cautions)
Error Red:               #F56565 (Errors, critical actions)
Info Blue:               #4299E1 (Info messages, tooltips)
```

**Point Economy Colors**:
```
Points Earned:           #48BB78 (Positive, rewards)
Points Spent:            #F56565 (Negative, costs)
Balance Neutral:         #F3BA2F (Current balance)
```

---

### 1.2 Typography

**Font Family**:
- **Primary**: Inter (Google Fonts) - Clean, readable, modern
- **Monospace**: JetBrains Mono - Code blocks, transaction hashes
- **Fallback**: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif

**Type Scale** (Material Design 3):
```
Display Large:      font-size: 57px, line-height: 64px, weight: 400 (Hero headings)
Display Medium:     font-size: 45px, line-height: 52px, weight: 400 (Section headings)
Display Small:      font-size: 36px, line-height: 44px, weight: 400 (Subsection headings)

Headline Large:     font-size: 32px, line-height: 40px, weight: 600 (Page titles)
Headline Medium:    font-size: 28px, line-height: 36px, weight: 600 (Card titles)
Headline Small:     font-size: 24px, line-height: 32px, weight: 600 (Widget titles)

Title Large:        font-size: 22px, line-height: 28px, weight: 500 (List items, post titles)
Title Medium:       font-size: 16px, line-height: 24px, weight: 500 (Subtitles, labels)
Title Small:        font-size: 14px, line-height: 20px, weight: 500 (Captions, tags)

Body Large:         font-size: 16px, line-height: 24px, weight: 400 (Main content)
Body Medium:        font-size: 14px, line-height: 20px, weight: 400 (Descriptions)
Body Small:         font-size: 12px, line-height: 16px, weight: 400 (Metadata, timestamps)

Label Large:        font-size: 14px, line-height: 20px, weight: 600 (Button text, form labels)
Label Medium:       font-size: 12px, line-height: 16px, weight: 600 (Chip text, badges)
Label Small:        font-size: 11px, line-height: 16px, weight: 600 (Tiny labels, counters)
```

**Responsive Typography** (Mobile):
- Reduce Display sizes by 20% on mobile (<768px)
- Minimum body text: 16px (WCAG readable without zoom)
- Maximum line length: 75 characters (optimal readability)

---

### 1.3 Spacing System (8px Grid)

```
Space-1:  4px   (Tiny gaps, icon padding)
Space-2:  8px   (Small gaps, button padding-y)
Space-3:  12px  (Medium gaps, form fields)
Space-4:  16px  (Standard gaps, card padding)
Space-5:  24px  (Large gaps, section spacing)
Space-6:  32px  (XL gaps, page margins)
Space-7:  48px  (XXL gaps, hero sections)
Space-8:  64px  (Huge gaps, page sections)
```

**Component Spacing**:
- Buttons: padding 12px 24px (vertical, horizontal)
- Cards: padding 24px
- Form fields: margin-bottom 16px
- Sections: margin-bottom 48px

---

### 1.4 Elevation & Shadows

```
Elevation-0:  box-shadow: none (Flat, inline elements)
Elevation-1:  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06) (Cards)
Elevation-2:  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06) (Hover cards)
Elevation-3:  box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05) (Modals)
Elevation-4:  box-shadow: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04) (Sticky headers)
```

---

### 1.5 Border Radius

```
Radius-None:   0px      (Sharp edges, images)
Radius-Small:  4px      (Buttons, inputs, chips)
Radius-Medium: 8px      (Cards, modals)
Radius-Large:  12px     (Large cards, containers)
Radius-XL:     16px     (Hero sections, feature cards)
Radius-Full:   9999px   (Circular avatars, pills)
```

---

**Key Elements**:
- **Hero Banner**: Clear value proposition, primary CTA ("Get Started")
- **Guest Browsing**: Show 5-10 trending posts without signup (SEO-friendly)
- **Soft Signup Prompts**: After scrolling 3 posts, show signup reminder
- **Social Proof**: Show user count, posts count, total rewards distributed

**Interactions**:
- Scroll: Infinite scroll loading more posts
- Click Post: Navigate to full post (guest can read, can't like/comment)
- Click "Sign Up": Navigate to registration flow

---

### Flow 2: Registration & Onboarding

**Purpose**: Quick, frictionless signup with OAuth2
**Persona**: Alex (Crypto Enthusiast), Tom (New Web3 User)
**Success Metric**: >70% registration completion, <3 minutes signup time

**Key Elements**:
- **OAuth2 Priority**: Discord, Twitter/X, Reddit (crypto-friendly platforms)
- **Instant Signup**: No email verification for OAuth (trust provider)
- **Bonus Notification**: Gamification, immediate positive reinforcement
- **Optional Profile**: Don't force profile completion, incentivize with points

**Accessibility**:
- Tab order: OAuth buttons â†’ Email â†’ Password â†’ Sign Up
- ARIA labels: "Sign in with Discord button" (screen readers)
- Keyboard shortcuts: Enter to submit, Escape to close modal

---

### Flow 3: Create Post (Core Feature)

**Purpose**: Frictionless content creation with rich media
**Persona**: Alex (Crypto Enthusiast), Maria (Content Creator)
**Success Metric**: <20 min post creation time, >60% posts with images

â”‚                                                                    â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

**Key Elements**:
- **Split View**: Markdown editor (left), Live preview (right)
- **Markdown Toolbar**: WYSIWYG-style buttons for non-technical users
- **Live Preview**: Real-time rendering as user types
- **Image Upload**: Drag-and-drop, progress indicators, IPFS confirmation
- **Auto-Save**: Every 30 seconds to prevent data loss
- **Point Cost**: Clear display of cost before publishing

**Interactions**:
- Type: Live preview updates in real-time
- Upload Image: Show progress bar, compress automatically, preview thumbnail
- Embed Video: Paste URL, auto-detect platform, show preview
- Save Draft: Auto-save + manual save button
- Publish: Deduct 5 points, show confirmation, redirect to post

**Accessibility**:
- Keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+B (bold), Ctrl+I (italic), Ctrl+Enter (publish)
- Alt text field for images (required for WCAG 2.1)
- Screen reader announces "Preview updated" when live preview changes

---

â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

**Key Elements**:
- **Educational**: Explain wallets simply, video tutorials, step-by-step guides
- **Delayed Connection**: Let users browse/post first, connect wallet when needed
- **Multiple Wallets**: MetaMask (desktop), WalletConnect (mobile), Binance Wallet (native)
- **Transparent Fees**: Show gas fees, swap fees, total cost before transaction
- **Progress Tracking**: Real-time transaction status, blockchain confirmation links

**Web3 UX Best Practices**:
- Don't force wallet connection on landing (high friction)
- Explain "Connect Wallet" in simple terms (avoid jargon)
- Show transaction progress (blockchain is slow, manage expectations)
- Provide help resources (live chat, video tutorials)

**Accessibility**:
- Screen reader announces each transaction step
- Keyboard navigation for all interactive elements
- High contrast mode for visually impaired users

---

### Flow 5: Post Feed & Discovery

**Purpose**: Engaging content discovery with filtering
**Persona**: Alex (Crypto Enthusiast), David (Lurker)
**Success Metric**: >5 posts viewed per session, <40% bounce rate

```
SCREEN: Homepage Feed (Logged In)

â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

**Key Elements**:
- **Balance Display**: Always visible, encourages recharge when low
- **Feed Filters**: Hot (algorithm), New (chronological), Top (most likes), Following (subscriptions)
- **Post Cards**: Avatar, username, level badge, timestamp, title, preview, image, actions
- **Like Button**: Shows count, changes color when user likes, costs 1 point
- **Share Button**: One-click social sharing (Twitter, Reddit, Discord)
- **Flag Button**: Report spam/scams (only for Level 3+ Trusted users)

**Interactions**:
- Click Post Card: Navigate to full post view
- Click Like: Deduct 1 point, update count, show animation
- Click Comment: Scroll to comment section
- Click Share: Open share modal with social platforms
- Scroll: Infinite scroll loads 20 more posts

**Responsive Design** (Mobile <768px):
- Stack elements vertically
- Reduce image size (thumbnail only)
- Collapse tags (show first 2, "+3 more")
- Touch-friendly buttons (44x44px minimum)

---

**Purpose**: Rich content display with nested comments
**Persona**: All personas
**Success Metric**: >5 comments per post avg, >50% like rate

```

**Key Elements**:
- **Rich Content**: Markdown rendering (headings, lists, bold, italic, links, images, videos)
- **Nested Comments**: 2 levels deep (comment â†’ reply â†’ reply-to-reply)
- **Author Badge**: Level badge (New User, Regular, Expert, Moderator, etc.)
- **Like Counter**: Real-time updates when users like
- **Comment Input**: Markdown support, live preview, point cost display

**Interactions**:
- Like Post: Deduct 1 point, increment like count, show animation
- Comment: Open comment input, cost 2 points
- Reply to Comment: Nested reply input appears
- Share: Open share modal (Twitter, Reddit, Discord, copy link)

---

### Flow 7: User Profile

**Purpose**: Display user reputation, activity, earned points
**Persona**: All personas
**Success Metric**: >80% users add avatar, >50% add bio

```

```

**Key Elements**:
- **Avatar**: Large 256x256px avatar (uploaded to IPFS)
- **Level Badge**: Visual indicator of user progression
- **Reputation**: Total points earned (not current balance)
- **Stats**: Posts, comments, likes received/given
- **Point Breakdown**: Transparency on earning sources
- **Activity Feed**: User's posts, comments, likes

**Edit Profile Modal**:
- Upload Avatar (max 5MB, JPEG/PNG/GIF/WebP)
- Edit Bio (500 chars max)
- Add Website URL
- Social links (Twitter, Discord, Reddit)

---

### Flow 8: Moderation Queue (Moderator View)

**Purpose**: Efficient content moderation with community voting
**Persona**: Sarah (Moderator)
**Success Metric**: <2 hour review time, >90% moderation accuracy

â”‚                                                                    â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

**Key Elements**:
- **Priority Queue**: High-priority flagged content shown first (5+ flags, multiple reporters)
- **Context**: User history, previous warnings, flag reasons
- **Community Voting**: Weighted votes (L4=1, L5=3, L6=5, L7=10)
- **Vote Breakdown**: Visual progress bar showing vote distribution
- **Public Log**: Transparency, all mod actions visible to users

**Moderation Actions**:
1. **Remove Content**: Hide from feed, notify user, log action
2. **Issue Warning**: Send message, log in user history, 3 warnings = temp ban
3. **Temp Ban**: 1 day, 7 days, or 30 days (user can't post/comment)
4. **Permanent Ban**: Requires Admin (L7) vote, irreversible

---

### Flow 9: Search & Discovery

**Purpose**: Powerful search with filters
**Persona**: David (Lurker), Alex (Crypto Enthusiast)
**Success Metric**: >40% users use search weekly, <30% zero-result searches

```

```

**Key Elements**:
- **Autocomplete**: Search suggestions as user types
- **Filters**: Type (posts/comments/users), Sort (relevance/date/likes), Date range, Category
- **Keyword Highlighting**: Bold matched keywords in title and snippet
- **Snippet**: First 150 chars of post with keyword context
- **Typo Suggestions**: "Did you mean...?" for misspellings
- **Related Searches**: Suggest similar queries

**PostgreSQL Full-Text Search**:
- `tsvector` index on posts.title and posts.body
- Ranked by relevance (ts_rank)
- Support for phrases, AND/OR operators
- Search across posts, comments, users

---

**Purpose**: Optimized mobile experience
**Persona**: Maria (Content Creator), Tom (New Web3 User)
**Success Metric**: >90% mobile users satisfied, <2s page load (4G)

**Mobile Optimizations**:
- **Touch Targets**: Minimum 44x44px (Apple HIG, Material Design)
- **Font Sizes**: Minimum 16px body text (no zoom on iOS)
- **Navigation**: Hamburger menu, bottom navigation bar
- **Images**: Full-width, lazy loading, WebP format
- **Forms**: Auto-focus, autocomplete, native keyboards
- **Sticky Header**: Balance and Create Post always visible

**Performance**:
- Page load: <2 seconds on 4G
- Time to Interactive: <3 seconds
- Image lazy loading (below fold)
- Code splitting (load components as needed)

---

## 3. Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG 2.1 Level AA)

### 3.1 Perceivable

**Text Alternatives (1.1)**:
- âœ… All images have alt text (required field in upload)
- âœ… Decorative images use empty alt="" (invisible to screen readers)
- âœ… Icons have aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Like button")

**Time-Based Media (1.2)**:
- âœ… Video embeds have captions (YouTube auto-captions)
- âš ï¸ Audio content not supported in MVP (Phase 2: Voice sessions)

**Adaptable (1.3)**:
- âœ… Semantic HTML (h1, h2, nav, main, article, footer)
- âœ… Proper heading hierarchy (h1 â†’ h2 â†’ h3, no skipping)
- âœ… Form labels explicitly associated with inputs (<label for="email">)
- âœ… ARIA landmarks (role="navigation", role="main", role="search")

**Distinguishable (1.4)**:
- âœ… Color contrast ratio â‰¥4.5:1 for normal text (WCAG AAA)
- âœ… Color contrast ratio â‰¥3:1 for large text (18px+) and UI components
- âœ… Text resizable to 200% without loss of functionality (responsive design)
- âœ… No content relies on color alone (use icons + color)
- âœ… Focus indicators visible (2px blue outline on focus)

---

### 3.2 Operable

**Keyboard Accessible (2.1)**:
- âœ… All functionality available via keyboard (no mouse required)
- âœ… Tab order logical (top to bottom, left to right)
- âœ… No keyboard traps (user can escape modals with Escape key)
- âœ… Skip to main content link (hidden until focused)

**Enough Time (2.2)**:
- âœ… No time limits on reading or interacting (auto-save prevents data loss)
- âœ… Session timeout: 7 days (extended with "Remember Me")

**Seizures and Physical Reactions (2.3)**:
- âœ… No flashing content (no animated GIFs >3Hz)
- âœ… Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion (CSS media query)

**Navigable (2.4)**:
- âœ… Page titles unique and descriptive (e.g., "How to Stake BNB - Decentralized Forum")
- âœ… Focus order meaningful (tab order matches visual order)
- âœ… Link text descriptive (avoid "Click here", use "Read full post")
- âœ… Multiple ways to find content (search, navigation, sitemap)
- âœ… Headings and labels descriptive (h1: "Create Post", h2: "Post Title")

**Input Modalities (2.5)**:
- âœ… Touch targets â‰¥44x44px (Material Design, Apple HIG)
- âœ… Gestures have keyboard/button alternatives (no swipe-only actions)
- âœ… Click/tap cancellable (mousedown â‰  submit, only mouseup submits)

---

### 3.3 Understandable

**Readable (3.1)**:
- âœ… Page language declared (<html lang="en">)
- âœ… Jargon explained with tooltips (e.g., "Wallet" has "?" icon)
- âœ… Abbreviations expanded on first use (BNB = Binance Coin)

**Predictable (3.2)**:
- âœ… Navigation consistent across pages (same header/footer)
- âœ… Focus does not trigger unexpected context changes
- âœ… Form submission requires explicit action (button click, not auto-submit)

**Input Assistance (3.3)**:
- âœ… Form errors identified and described (e.g., "Email format invalid")
- âœ… Error suggestions provided (e.g., "Did you mean john@gmail.com?")
- âœ… Labels and instructions provided for all inputs
- âœ… Error prevention for critical actions (e.g., "Confirm delete account?")

---

### 3.4 Robust

**Compatible (4.1)**:
- âœ… HTML valid (no syntax errors)
- âœ… ARIA used correctly (no conflicting roles)
- âœ… Status messages announced (e.g., "Post published successfully")
- âœ… Screen reader tested with NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver

---

### 3.5 Accessibility Testing Checklist

**Automated Testing**:
- [ ] Lighthouse Accessibility Score: â‰¥95/100
- [ ] axe DevTools: 0 violations
- [ ] WAVE Browser Extension: 0 errors

**Manual Testing**:
- [ ] Keyboard navigation (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Escape, Arrow keys)
- [ ] Screen reader testing (NVDA on Windows, VoiceOver on macOS/iOS)
- [ ] Color contrast checker (WebAIM Contrast Checker)
- [ ] Zoom to 200% (no horizontal scroll, no content loss)
- [ ] Mobile touch targets (min 44x44px)

**User Testing**:
- [ ] Test with blind users (screen reader usability)
- [ ] Test with low-vision users (high contrast mode, zoom)
- [ ] Test with motor-impaired users (keyboard-only navigation)
- [ ] Test with cognitive disabilities (simple language, clear instructions)

---

## 4. Component Library

### 4.1 Buttons

**Primary Button**:
```
[Primary CTA]
- Background: #F3BA2F (BNB Yellow)
- Text: #1A202C (Dark gray)
- Padding: 12px 24px
- Border-radius: 4px
- Font-weight: 600
- Hover: darken 10% (#D9A004)
- Focus: 2px blue outline
- Min-height: 44px (touch-friendly)
```

**Secondary Button**:
```
[Secondary Action]
- Background: transparent
- Text: #2B6CB0 (Blue)
- Border: 2px solid #2B6CB0
- Padding: 10px 22px (account for border)
- Border-radius: 4px
- Hover: background #EBF8FF
```

**Tertiary Button** (Text-only):
```
[Tertiary Link]
- Background: transparent
- Text: #2B6CB0 (Blue)
- Border: none
- Padding: 12px 16px
- Hover: underline
```

---

### 4.2 Forms

**Text Input**:
```
[Email                              ]
- Background: #FFFFFF
- Border: 1px solid #E2E8F0
- Border-radius: 4px
- Padding: 12px 16px
- Font-size: 16px (prevent zoom on iOS)
- Focus: border #2B6CB0, box-shadow 0 0 0 3px rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.5)
- Error: border #F56565, error message below
```

**Textarea**:
```
[Post body...                       ]
[                                    ]
[                                    ]
- Same as text input
- Min-height: 120px
- Resize: vertical (user-controlled)
- Character counter: "2,000/10,000 chars"
```

**Select Dropdown**:
```
[Category â–¼]
- Same as text input
- Chevron icon (â–¼) on right
- Options: max-height 300px, scroll if needed
```
